TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit RSA extends System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm
Public MustInherit Class RSA Inherits AsymmetricAlgorithm

summary.span: 表示基底類別， 演算法的所有實作都會從它衍生。

span.span: Represents the base class from which all implementations of the algorithm inherit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 擴充此類別證明您實作`RSA`索引鍵。Extending this class proves that you are implementing an `RSA` key. 這是必要的任何提供新的開發人員`RSA`索引鍵的實作。This is required for any developer providing a new `RSA` key implementation. 這個類別的唯一目的是做為識別的階層成員`RSA`演算法。The only purpose of this class is as a hierarchy member for identification of the `RSA` algorithm. 可在有安裝 Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider 的情況下，支援從 384 位元到 16384 位元長度的金鑰 (以 8 位元的單位累加)。The supports key lengths from 384 bits to 16384 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed. 它可在有安裝 Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider 的情況下，支援從 384 位元到 512 位元長度的金鑰 (以 8 位元的單位累加)。It supports key lengths from 384 bits to 512 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider installed.

Protected Sub New ()
protected: RSA();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是受保護的方法，只能從衍生自的類別呼叫。This is a protected method that can only be called from a class derived from . 您無法建立抽象類別的執行個體。You cannot create an instance of an abstract class.

summary.span: 允許執行個體化 的特定實作。

span.span: Allows specific implementations of to be instantiated.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void FromXmlString (string xmlString);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void FromXmlString(string xmlString) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub FromXmlString (xmlString As String)
public: override void FromXmlString(System::String ^ xmlString);

param.name: xmlString
param.span: 包含 金鑰資訊的 XML 字串。

span.span: The XML string containing key information.

summary.span: 從 XML 字串的金鑰資訊初始化 物件。

span.span: Initializes an object from the key information from an XML string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化使用產生的 XML 字串中使用索引鍵資訊的 RSA 物件方法。The initializes an RSA object using key information in an XML string that was generated using the method. 方法會接受包含公開金鑰的 XML 字串或包含公開和私用金鑰的 XML 字串。The method accepts either an XML string containing a public key or an XML string containing a public and private key. 使用方法，以方便地初始化金鑰資訊。Use the method to conveniently initialize key information. > [!CAUTION] > 保存的 XML 字串，包含私密金鑰不安全的位置是一項安全性威脅。Persisting an XML string containing a private key to an insecure location is a security threat. 如果惡意的協力廠商可以存取您的私密金鑰，可以危害您的應用程式的安全性。The security of your application can be compromised if a malicious third party can access your private key. 若要安全地保存的私密金鑰，使用安全的金鑰容器。To safely persist a private key, use a secure key container. 如需金鑰容器中保存私密金鑰的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 在金鑰容器儲存非對稱金鑰](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md)。For more information about persisting private keys in a key container, see [How to: Store Asymmetric Keys in a Key Container](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md).

span.span: The parameter is .
The format of the parameter is not valid.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string ToXmlString (bool includePrivateParameters);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToXmlString(bool includePrivateParameters) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToXmlString (includePrivateParameters As Boolean) As String
public: override System::String ^ ToXmlString(bool includePrivateParameters);

param.name: includePrivateParameters
param.span: 若是 則會加入公開和私密 RSA 金鑰， 則只會加入公開金鑰。

span.span: to include a public and private RSA key; to include only the public key.

summary.span: 建立並傳回 XML 字串，其中包含目前 物件的金鑰。

span.span: Creates and returns an XML string containing the key of the current object.

returns.span: XML 字串，其中包含目前 物件的金鑰。

span.span: An XML string containing the key of the current object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法會建立 XML 字串，包含目前的公用和私用金鑰物件，或只包含公開金鑰的目前物件。The method creates an XML string that contains either the public and private key of the current object or contains only the public key of the current object. 使用每當您需要方便地保存 RSA 金鑰資訊的方法。Use the method whenever you need to conveniently persist RSA key information. 初始化XML 的字串，使用索引鍵物件方法。To initialize an object with the key in an XML string, use the method. > [!CAUTION] > 保存的 XML 字串，包含私密金鑰不安全的位置是一項安全性威脅。Persisting an XML string containing a private key to an insecure location is a security threat. 如果惡意的協力廠商可以存取您的私密金鑰，可以危害您的應用程式的安全性。The security of your application can be compromised if a malicious third party can access your private key. 若要安全地保存的私密金鑰，使用安全的金鑰容器。To safely persist a private key, use a secure key container. 如需金鑰容器中保存私密金鑰的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 在金鑰容器儲存非對稱金鑰](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md)。For more information about persisting private keys in a key container, see [How to: Store Asymmetric Keys in a Key Container](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md). 當您將傳遞`true`至方法，產生的 XML 字串會採用下列格式：When you pass `true` to the method, the resulting XML string takes the following form: ``` … …

…

… … … … … ``` 當您將傳遞`false`至方法，產生的 XML 字串會採用下列格式：When you pass `false` to the method, the resulting XML string takes the following form: ``` … … ```
